_source.short_desc: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system built to improve efficiency and dramatically cut costs.
_source.long_desc: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system. Built specifically for foodservice, Toast is remarkably easy to use. Toast customers can easily fulfill orders, update online and in-house menus, and manage staff payroll. With online ordering, advanced real-time reporting and loyalty programs built in, Toast eliminates the need to juggle multiple vendors and dramatically cuts costs.
_source.pricing_details:
Starter: From $0 per month (Flexible payment options available)

Essentials: $165 per month (3 months free on Online Ordering)

Custom: Custom Price

New Restaurant Basics: $110 per month
_source.target_audience: Toast is designed exclusively for foodservice. While other POS systems are split up between industries, Toast has always been focused on addressing the specific challenges of foodservice providers.

related_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
related_products.features:
When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. 
Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

related_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust scheduling, communication, and engagement tool built specifically for restaurants. Simplify your life. Start free!
related_products.features: 7shifts empowers restaurants of all sizes to trim labor costs, retain staff, and stay labor compliant with robust scheduling, communication, compliance, and engagement tools. 7shifts helps restaurant managers save 5 hours/week on scheduling, minimize call & text chaos with streamlined communication, manage staff on-the-go with free mobile apps, and trim labor costs up to 3% with integrated POS data. Join 700,000+ restaurants using 7shifts to simplify management. Start your free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues.
related_products.features: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues that will increase sales and streamline the booking process. It is the first web-based system created by hospitality event managers for hospitality event managers. Since 2008 Tripleseat has taken the restaurant business by storm providing solutions and simplifying the event process from start to finish. Over 2,500 venues and 18,000+ event industry expert trust Tripleseat.

related_products.short_desc: CAKE POS is designed to meet the unique needs of restaurants. A simple, intuitive and cost-friendly solution.
related_products.features:
CAKE built its POS to meet the demands of Quick & Full Service restaurants. It is simple, intuitive, and cost-friendly.

Easily handle Quick Service rush hours with line-busting OrderPads that control the flow of traffic and a customer-facing display for guests to privately pay, tip, and sign from their own screen. Supercharge your Full-Service POS with rich guest profiles and automatic table status updates. CAKE POS makes it easy for restaurants to get more done every day.

related_products.short_desc: HotSchedules reduces food and labor costs, time spent on administrative tasks, and operational complexity.
related_products.features: HotSchedules provides a cloud-based operating platform, as well as supporting solutions and services for the restaurant, retail and hospitality industries. HotSchedules suite of products enables owners and operators to schedule employees across locations, track time and attendance, monitor business performance and manage day-to-day operations. With HotSchedules native mobile app, employees can check schedules, pick-up and drop shifts, and request time off, all from their mobile phones.

related_products.short_desc: TouchBistro has been designed to meet the unique needs and specific demands of the restaurant industry.
related_products.features: TouchBistro is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system that makes running a restaurant easier. Built to meet the unique needs of the restaurant industry, TouchBistro is fast, reliable, and easy to use, and has all of the features restaurateurs need to increase sales, deliver a great guest experience, and save both time and money. By pairing innovative restaurant technology and dedication to customer support and success, TouchBistro has powered more than 29,000 restaurants globally!

related_products.short_desc: Simplify FOH busywork while growing your following with our high-intent network, so you can focus on the guest.
related_products.features: Yelp Guest Manager helps restaurants manage all of their front-of-house operations across the entire dining experience through one fully integrated solution - by bringing together Yelp Waitlist, Reservations, Kiosk, Takeout, Table Management, online brand building and more into one product. Yelp Guest Manager combines Yelp's high-intent diner network with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations from takeout and delivery orders to dine-in seating.

related_products.short_desc: Build the Restaurant of tomorrow, today. Evolve your business with the future of POS technology.
related_products.features:
Restaurant management for the future

Our Restaurant POS System will help you stay ahead in an evolving industry.

Easily connect to major ordering and delivery apps to create new revenue streams and meet customer expectations.

Track inventory, calculate costs and profit, simplify reordering and integrate with leading accounting software.

Leverage powerful sales reports on any device to boost profitability, reduce wastage and improve employee efficiency.

related_products.short_desc: POS for Restaurants, Bars and Cafes. Complete restaurant and bar management system.
related_products.features: Upserve by Lightspeed is an industry-leading POS used by thousands of restaurants that serves up insights daily. Specifically designed by restaurant people, Upserve by Lightspeed merges an easy-to-use interface with powerful POS features to modernize and streamline your restaurant operations: including Online Ordering, Contactless Payments, and Tableside Devices to boost profits and optimize your restaurant operations.

related_products.short_desc: Jolt is an app used to manage daily operations and hourly workers, giving real-time feedback to restaurant owners and managers.
related_products.features: Jolt is a tablet-based software used to manage daily operations for brands like Chick-fil-A, McDonald's, and Buffalo Wild Wings. Owners and managers get a real-time look at daily operations from their phone, and in-store tablets keep staff accountable and on task. Jolt includes a training library, drag-n-drop schedule builder, text notifications, a time clock, and more. Trusted in thousands of restaurants across the globe, Jolt has helped over 300,000 users complete over 700 million tasks.

similar_products.short_desc: Get an overview of your restaurant's food safety in seconds. Use the pre-filled monitoring checks. Switch to digital in 15 minutes.
similar_products.features:
AI-powered food safety management system for restaurants to serve and sell 100% safe food. Maintain your food safety with minimum effort. An automated setup enables you to go digital in 15 minutes.

Our app notifications help your team to remember all daily tasks. Save 20% of your time spent supervising and use automatically filled monitoring checks. The built-in HACCP builder creates you a HACCP plan in 1 hour that is customizable any time.

similar_products.short_desc: Square for Restaurants powers front and back of house operations for your full-service, quick-service, or fast-casual restaurant, bar
similar_products.features: The Square for Restaurants Point of Sale platform powers your speed and flexibility across front and back of house operations for your full-service restaurant, quick-service restaurant, fast-casual restaurant, bar or brewery. Handle online ordering, menus, table layouts, cover counts, coursing, payment processing, real-time reporting, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: 7shifts is a robust scheduling, communication, and engagement tool built specifically for restaurants. Simplify your life. Start free!
similar_products.features: 7shifts empowers restaurants of all sizes to trim labor costs, retain staff, and stay labor compliant with robust scheduling, communication, compliance, and engagement tools. 7shifts helps restaurant managers save 5 hours/week on scheduling, minimize call & text chaos with streamlined communication, manage staff on-the-go with free mobile apps, and trim labor costs up to 3% with integrated POS data. Join 700,000+ restaurants using 7shifts to simplify management. Start your free trial today!

similar_products.short_desc: Join our 60 day program and we prove our worth is 10x what you pay. Just check our reviews.
similar_products.features: Restaurant Systems Pro will easily provide a multiple ROI. There is a risk free 60 Day program where we give you everything. Software that provides systems for the whole restaurant.  Connects to your POS system. Our 60 Day program gives you over $5k of consulting and services for $197. We put our money where our mouth is and prove we can get you a return on $5k of services for fraction of the costs.  RSP has multiple systems all connected and in one place. We will double your profits for $197.

similar_products.short_desc: Simphony POS is built for complete restaurant management for businesses of all backgrounds and sizes. Upgrade your POS hardware for $1.
similar_products.features: Oracle Simphony POS offers complete restaurant management. Our cloud-based POS connects every aspect of your operations so you can easily manage online orders, kitchen ops, inventory & menus, delivery, loyalty & more. Real-time analytics are included so you always have a pulse on sales, costs & staff performance. Simphony's open API & extensive cloud marketplace gives you unlimited scale. Upgrade your POS hardware for $1.

similar_products.short_desc: Get visually engaging digital menu boards on your TV screens in seconds and engage your customers. Upsell and cross-sell menu items.
similar_products.features: Yodeck makes it a breeze to get digital menu boards up on your TV screens in just a few seconds. Engage your customers with photos and videos of your specials to cross-sell and upsell menu items. Drag & drop media files into our app or use our free, professionally designed menu board layout templates. They're fully customizable so you can incorporate your own branding. Manage screens across locations remotely. With Yodeck, you get easy to use, professional digital signage at an unbeatable price.

similar_products.short_desc:
Our mission is to keep local thriving! 

We empower local pizzerias with the ordering, tech, and marketing tools of the big chains.
similar_products.features:
Grow Business. Gain Regulars.

Join the 18,000+ pizzerias nationwide that are already part of the Slice family. 

Slice is a system that focuses on online ordering and automated marketing creating loyal customers to grow your business - Slice's partners see up to 50% more repeat customers.

similar_products.short_desc: The Next-Gen Restaurant POS System: Easier, Faster, Modern
similar_products.features: NO SOFTWARE FEES FOR THE FIRST TWO TERMINALS. All Included for free: Online ordering, Inventory control, theft mitigation, EMV compliant Bar Tabs, advanced check splitting, QR Code ordering and Payments, delivery management, advanced pizza functionality, couponing, tableside ordering, rewards program, automated happy hour, customizable reports, built in drink recipes & more! Nobody beats Rezku's value. IF YOU HAVE MORE THAN TWO TERMINALS USE UNLIMITED TERMINALS FOR JUST $99/MONTH.

similar_products.features:
When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. 
Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

similar_products.features: TouchBistro is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system that makes running a restaurant easier. Built to meet the unique needs of the restaurant industry, TouchBistro is fast, reliable, and easy to use, and has all of the features restaurateurs need to increase sales, deliver a great guest experience, and save both time and money. By pairing innovative restaurant technology and dedication to customer support and success, TouchBistro has powered more than 29,000 restaurants globally!

similar_products.short_desc: Operandio is an operations & digital checklist platform that helps business owners and managers raise the standard of their workforce.
similar_products.features:
Operandio is an operations and digital checklist platform that helps business owners and managers achieve staff accountability, safety, compliance and consistent business processes across multiple locations.

Raise the standard of your workforce with Operandio:

- Recurring tasks, checklists and procedures accessible via mobile or shared tablet apps
- Business knowledge and training, searchable and accessible to your entire workforce
- Powerful workforce messaging and communication
- Reporting

similar_products.short_desc: Restaurant inventory management made easy.
similar_products.features: Cloud based Restaurant inventory management software and app.  MarketMan gives you the tools you need to manage your inventory, suppliers, orders, and menu costing.  Get accurate food cost and know where your money is going in real time.  Set alerts when menu items become less profitable and get notifications when supplier prices fluctuate.  The result is better control and more profits.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Catering software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Catering tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Catering software manages business functions for the catering, event planning, and banquet management industries. Catering software provides an integrated solution for coordinating essential business processes including client details, locations, scheduling, inventory management, menu planning, waitstaff coordination, and payroll, as well as marketing and budgeting functions. Catering tools can include document management functionality to help track proposals, deposits, contracts, and client histories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Food Costing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Food Costing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Food Costing Software allows restaurants to easily calculate food costs for their recipes, in order to ensure profitable menu pricing.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Food Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Food Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Food Service Management software enables inventory control, purchasing, receiving and recipe management for both public and private food service operations. Organizations use these applications to manage their back office functions as well as their customer relationship and accounting needs. Food Service Management software helps to control costs, monitor inventory, and automate labor intensive tasks. Food Service Management software is related to Catering software, Food Service Distribution software and Restaurant Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nutrition Analysis software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nutrition Analysis tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nutrition Analysis software can be used in food service and food manufacturing industries to calculate nutritional values for menu items and recipes, generate nutrition and ingredient labels, and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant POS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant POS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant POS software offers point of sale solutions specifically for the restaurant and bar industries. This type of software provides ordering, billing, reporting, accounting, table tracking, and receipt printing capabilities for restaurants and bars. Hardware such as computers, monitors and printers is often included in the purchase of POS systems. Restaurant POS software is related to POS software and Restaurant Management software.

category_features.definition: Accept and process financial transactions

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

related_products.short_desc: Untether and sell anywhere with a complete iPad Kiosk.
related_products.features:
Perfect for selling in-store or on-the-go, our iPad Kiosk offers unrivaled flexibility and control. Complete with multi-award-winning EPOS software, it allows business owners to manage their inventory, sales, staff, and customer relationships all from the convenience of a portable tablet.

Our iPad EPOS system includes POS Software, an Apple iPad Stand, Cash Drawer, and Thermal Receipt Printer. You also have the option to add your own iPad or add a 10.2" iPad to your bundle.

related_products.short_desc: Lockdown iPhone or iPad into a Kiosk Mode (One App Mode). It ensures device & data security of iOS devices by restricting app access.
related_products.features: Scalefusion is a leading Mobile Device & Endpoint Management software helping businesses globally to secure and manage their device fleet. Scalefusion simplifies management of diverse fleet of Android, iOS, macOS and Windows 10 devices. Our platform extends support to various deployment scenarios such as dedicated-device, COPE (Corporate-owned, Personally Enabled), and BYOD (Bring Your Own Device).

related_products.short_desc: Turn your iPhone or iPad into a kiosk using Hexnode MDM
related_products.features: Hexnode MDM allows the users to lockdown their iOS devices in kiosk mode. The users can set up devices either in single app or multi-app kiosk mode. Single app kiosk locks the device to a single app while multi-app kiosk whitelists a group of specific apps, suppressing all others. The web app kiosk provides access to whitelisted web pages, blocking all other websites. Additional options like changing screen orientation, VoiceOver, enabling zoom and assistive touch enhance the kiosk functions.

related_products.short_desc: Built for retail, Shopify iPad POS brings your sales, inventory, and customers together across brick & mortar and online locations.
related_products.features: Shopify POS has the essential features you'd expect from a traditional POS plus the features you need for the future. Run your online and retail stores from one app, so you don't need to keep track of multiple inventories, catalogs, and payment systems. Customers and orders are synced across online and in-store, so offering local pickup, processing returns/exchanges, and selling gift cards anywhere is easy. Get the iPad POS that gets your retail business.

related_products.short_desc: LINGA rOS? has a broad feature set built to serve QSR, full-service, bars, pizzerias, Bubble Tea Shops, Cigar Lounges and franchises...
related_products.features: Used by restaurants & franchises all over the world, LINGA rOS is the worlds first enterprise-ready cloud-based restaurant operating system that offers convenience, ease of use, and technology. Including a set of integrations such as Point of Sale, Loyalty Program, Inventory Management, Kitchen Display System, Online Ordering, Cloud Kitchen, Driver app, and QR Pay, LINGA restaurant operating system is an innovative response to the demand for a one-stop solution for restaurant owners.

related_products.short_desc: Moki Total Control enables you to quickly and easily manage all of your Android, iOS and BrightSign devices at scale.
related_products.features: Turn your iOS tablet into a kiosk that showcases your videos, images, other web-based content, or website. Restrict browsing to approved sites and measure performance/usage. Built-in remote management functionality allows you to update, secure and control large fleets of devices from afar. Fully customize your logo, color, navigation bars, other layout options, and more. Keep your user's sensitive data safe after each interaction by clearing cache, cookies, or saved data.

related_products.short_desc: VISO makes your devices mission-oriented, optimally configured and locked down to a secured kiosk mode, preventing unwanted operations.
related_products.features: VISO streamlines the implementation of multi app kiosk mode by switching devices to encapsulated environments with predetermined functionality and device look and feel, locking down external ports, hardware elements and applications, and preventing user interaction, except whitelisted applications and relevant hardware elements. You can manage multiple kiosk mode devices centrally, monitor activities, collect reports and implement policy and security measures.

related_products.short_desc: Integrated platform for senior living communities connecting staff, residents & family.
related_products.features:
Cubigo is a fully customizable integrated community platform that connects staff, residents and family members within senior living. We digitize the daily services in these communities including activities, dining, maintenance and transportation. 

We increase staff efficiency, improve workflows, foster resident empowerment and enable family involvement. Cubigo provides reporting & analytics, roles & rights management, wellness tracking and smart integrations with software partners

related_products.short_desc: Your Web site, optimized for iPad. Can be combined with other apps from the Ombori Grid to create unique multifunctional kiosks.
related_products.features:
A versatile multifunctional kiosk based on iPad that includes a variety of optional features including Web browsing, endless aisle, digital coupons, wayfinding, self checkout, appointment booking, virtual queuing, and more. 

Select and customize the apps you need to suit your business goals. 

All apps are based on the Ombori Grid, allowing them to share information and communicate with staff and customers via text, mobile, and other media.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable self checkout iPad kiosk. Trusted by largest fast food, business lunch and convenience stores in Baltics.
related_products.features: Affordable self checkout iPad kiosk. Trusted by largest fast food, business lunch and convenience stores in Baltics.

related_products.short_desc: Digital check-in app that tracks attendance using self-check-in links, public QR code, iPad kiosk, QR pass, survey, photo, & signature.
related_products.features:
OneTap is a digital attendance app used by event organizers, gyms, martial arts studios, yoga studios, schools, universities, and nonprofits. OneTap helps businesses create a check-in process using multiple devices with features like self-check-in link, customized kiosk, survey, photo, QR passes, and signature.

Easily check-in and check-out people, track attendance, maintain a customer/client/visitor database, invite team members, import & export Excel files, run reports, and set up alerts.

similar_products.short_desc: Allows you to turn an iOS device into a single-purpose kiosk displaying full-screen websites, documents, multimedia, and more.
similar_products.features:
WebFrame allows you to turn an iOS device into a single-purpose kiosk displaying full-screen web apps, web pages, multimedia, documents, and more. WebFrame features the following capabilities:

 Full Screen Browser
 Approved Domain List
 Inactivity Timeout
 Smart Navigation Buttons
 User Interaction Controls
 Printer Support
 Local Configuration
 iCloud Settings Sync

similar_products.short_desc: ManageEngine Mobile Device Manager Plus is an Enterprise Mobile Device Management software to manage your iOS, Android & Windows device
similar_products.features:
ManageEngine Mobile Device Manager Plus is an Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) solution that gives enterprises the ability to harness the power of mobility.
 
Improve employee productivity without compromising on enterprise security with features like mobile device management, application management, email management and device containerization.
 
Available as both an on premise as well as a cloud offering, MDM has been developed keeping user demands and IT security requirements in mind.

similar_products.short_desc: This cloud-based POS centralizes inventory management, employee management, sales reporting & accounting across locations and channels.
similar_products.features: Promo: Save up to $1,000 on our retail digital bundle. This cloud-based POS centralizes inventory management, employee management, sales reporting & accounting across locations and channels.

similar_products.short_desc: Lavu's iPad-based mobile POS and full-featured management platform are designed specifically to streamline restaurant operations.
similar_products.features:
As featured in Gordon Ramsey's Kitchen Nightmares!  
STARTING AT $59/MO WITH FREE HARDWARE INCLUDED 
Purpose-built for restaurants by restaurant people, Lavu's easy-to-use, mobile POS and restaurant management platform is designed to fit any dining type, cuisine, and budget. Lavu streamlines operations and increases revenue while delighting customers. Offering in-house payment processing, online ordering, detailed reporting, loyalty programs, labor management, inventory management & more.

similar_products.short_desc: This all-in-one retail POS brings point-of-sale, eCommerce, and marketing tools together into one system.
similar_products.features: Rain provides an all-in-one retail POS system with everything you need to sell online and in-store.  It includes  an integrated eCommerce website as well as automated marketing tools. Retailers using Rain give high marks to the seamless relationship between in-store POS and the website.  Rain's support ranks very high as well.  On average, Rain customers experience a 21% increase in year-over-year revenue after implementing it's software in their stores.

similar_products.short_desc: HungerRush 360 provides solutions for everything you need to know your customers, manage your operations and grow your business.
similar_products.features:
Orders are the lifeblood of everything else a restaurant needs to do. Inventory, labor, marketing, delivery, and, of course, payment-all these are connected to the humble order, and today, the POS is becoming that central nervous system for all restaurant processes and transactions, including those with guests.

As HungerRush, we're leading the charge in this transition from the POS of the past to the POS of the future. We're calling it the HungerRush 360 Restaurant Experience.

similar_products.short_desc: Create interactive experiences that extend well beyond standard touch monitor sizes -  Capture valuable information and generate leads
similar_products.features:
Create multi-touch presentations in just minutes. - Upload 100s of your HD Pics, Videos, and Text.  Advanced UI/UX, custom look and feel. - No Coding Required! 
Create a project in no time - Compatible with any Windows based touch devices
Ideal for large format touch display Video Walls, interactive kiosk, touch tables and tablets
Compatible with Microsoft Surface for mobile presentations
Rental solutions for both Coffee Table and Presenter Table

similar_products.short_desc: On-premise kiosk solution that enables photo booth operators to upload photos or videos, add overlays, remove green screens, and more.
similar_products.features: On-premise kiosk solution that enables photo booth operators to upload photos or videos, add overlays, remove green screens, and more.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Signage tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Signage software allows for the creation, scheduling, and distribution of multimedia signs, advertisements, and informational content. This type of software is suited for hotels, casinos, hospitality services, airports, shopping malls, corporate real estate managers, and any other entity that seeks digital advertisements or information boards. Digital Signage software is related to Kiosk software, Marketing Automation software, and Public Relations software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of iPad POS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Kiosk software enables public access terminals to offer software applications to end users. Kiosk solutions allow organizations to offer self-service stations to customers, thereby decreasing overhead costs. Self-service kiosks can provide airline check-in, ticket purchase, food and beverage orders, and other services. These applications must allow for security, monitoring and management of remotely deployed kiosks. Kiosk software is related to Ticketing software and Digital Signage Software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Order Entry software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Order Entry tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Order Entry software automates the entry, processing and management of sales orders across multiple channels, including: phone, mail order, retail and internet purchases. They also offer category specific feature sets for specific retail sectors such as: cellular/wireless, electronics, furniture, appliance, gifts, pharmacy front stores and music stores. Order Entry applications typically offer real-time integration with inventory control, order management, payment processing, marketing and customer relationship management, helping to optimize costs and increase efficiency. Order Entry software is related to eCommerce software and Order Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Ticketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Ticketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Ticketing software manages and automates online, kiosk, and box office ticketing for special events, theaters, parks, festivals, fairs, travel, and other activities. These applications help manage seat selections, event management, exhibitor data, performer assignments and locations, as well as online and onsite payment processing. Ticketing solutions also often integrate other business processes such as inventory control, transaction control, fulfillment history and sales tracking. Ticketing software is related to Event software, Registration software and Kiosk software.

_source.short_desc: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system built to improve efficiency and dramatically cut costs.
_source.long_desc: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system built to improve efficiency and dramatically cut costs.
_source.pricing_details:
Starter: From $0 per month (Flexible payment options available)

Essentials: $165 per month (3 months free on Online Ordering)

Custom: Custom Price

New Restaurant Basics: $110 per month
_source.target_audience: Toast is designed exclusively for foodservice. While other POS systems are split up between industries, Toast has always been focused on addressing the specific challenges of foodservice providers.

category_features.name: Accounting
category_features.definition: Built-in accounting or integration with a third party accounting system

category_features.name: Customer Management
category_features.definition: Capture and analyze information about your customers and interactions with them

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Food Delivery Dispatching
category_features.definition: Dispatch food deliveries

category_features.definition: Serves restaurants

category_features.name: Gift Card Management
category_features.definition: Reward loyal customers with gift cards which they can redeem for special offers and loyalty bonus

category_features.name: Kitchen / Menu Management
category_features.definition: Lets you to see your inventory and build a menu that?s appropriate

category_features.name: Live Tracking
category_features.definition: Allow customers to track their order and keep them updated when the status changes.

category_features.name: Loyalty Program
category_features.definition: Marketing tool to have customers return for benefits

category_features.name: Online Ordering
category_features.definition: Tracks and process online orders

category_features.name: Order Management
category_features.definition: Organize, track, monitor and execute customer orders for goods, investments, or any other purcahses

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Routing
category_features.definition: Provide directions and plan the day's work to optimize employee scheduling

category_features.name: Barcode / Ticket Scanning
category_features.definition: The ability to scan barcodes to ensure accurate pricing and label tracking

category_features.name: Commission Management
category_features.definition: Track employee commission potential and earnings

category_features.name: Discount Management
category_features.definition: Track products that are for sale at a reduced price

category_features.name: Gift Card Management
category_features.definition: Reward loyal customers with gift cards which they can redeem for special offers and loyalty bonus

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Loyalty Program
category_features.definition: Provide customers with the ability to earn reward points for repeat purchases. Points can be used to get discounts on future purchases

category_features.name: Pricing Management
category_features.definition: Develop, set, execute and measure prices as an ongoing process

category_features.name: Returns Tracking
category_features.definition: See what items have been returned

category_features.name: Sales Reports
category_features.definition: View and analyze the quantities of products being sold at any given period

category_features.name: eCommerce Management
category_features.definition: Sell products online

related_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
related_products.features: When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

related_products.short_desc: CAKE POS is designed to meet the unique needs of restaurants. A simple, intuitive and cost-friendly solution.
related_products.features:
CAKE built its POS to meet the demands of Quick & Full Service restaurants. It is simple, intuitive, and cost-friendly.

Easily handle Quick Service rush hours with line-busting OrderPads that control the flow of traffic and a customer-facing display for guests to privately pay, tip, and sign from their own screen. Supercharge your Full-Service POS with rich guest profiles and automatic table status updates. CAKE POS makes it easy for restaurants to get more done every day.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable, custom labeling and accompanying tablet-based software make Jolt a top choice for bakeries, delis, and cafes.
related_products.features: Combine Jolt labeling with its tablet-based software, and you can digitize operations for your bakery, deli, or cafe overnight. Jolt offers the most affordable custom labeling on the market, and the accompanying software includes a training library, drag-n-drop schedule builder, email and text notifications, a time clock with facial detection, and more. With time stamps on every label, every punch, and every task, Jolt gives managers and owners the insight needed to make their bakery a success.

related_products.short_desc: POS Nation offers an all-in-one point of sale solution to streamline your small or medium-sized retail business.
related_products.features:
POS Nation for Retail offers a complete point of sale solution to streamline your small or medium-sized retail business. 

We support retailers with a turnkey solution so you have the hardware, software, and payment processing needed to improve checkout, create happier customers, and grow your business. 

POS Nation's 10,000+ customers are backed by our dedicated customer service team, including 24/7 US-based support.

related_products.short_desc: The first POS made for quick-service restaurants, bakeries, takeaway and on-the-go customers made to streamline your operations.
related_products.features: The first POS made for quick-service and takeaway bakeries & restaurants that bridges online and regular orders. MYR stops customer-loss during your rush and features fully-integrated ordering apps for takeaway and delivery.

related_products.short_desc: This POS provides bakeries with the taste of efficiency! Track your sales, train employees and take orders from anywhere using an iPad.
related_products.features: Future-proof your business with Lightspeed Restaurant and its features like delivery, contactless payment & customizable floor plans for social distancing. With Lightspeed powering your bakery, you can focus less on operations and more on personalizing your service to increase customer satisfaction. Always ensure order accuracy during busy mornings with a customer facing display and cut down on line-ups with a self-order kiosk directly connected to your POS.

related_products.short_desc: KORONA designed POS software specifically for bakeries. The powerful solution was built to help businesses succeed and grow.
related_products.features: KORONA's bakery POS makes growing your business easy. The software boasts fast transactions, ease of pricing and promotions, full customization, and powerful inventory management. The solution also comes with a built-in loyalty program, tip options, and individualized cashier reports. It can work for single shops, multi-location operations, and franchises. KORONA's bakery point of sale software caters to each individual shop, not the other way around.

related_products.short_desc: A collaborative, shareable recipe management system with food costing, scaling, conversions and more
related_products.features: meez is the all-in-one recipe tool for culinary professionals centralizing the development process, making menus easier to execute, and offering a universally accessible and editable recipe format. The first-of-its-kind culinary operating system created for chefs by chefs has laser-accurate food costing, intuitive scaling, built-in conversions and yields, docs for training materials, and photo and video sharing.

related_products.short_desc: Wholesale bakeries: Online ordering, inventory control, supply chain traceability. AR, GP by item and by customer. GPS deliveries. CRM.
related_products.features: WHOLESALE BAKERY: Online ordering and invoicing. Custom pricing by customer by item.  Standing orders. Accounts Receivable and Gross Profit reports.  Talks to Quickbooks and Xero.  Recipes, supply chain traceability, purchase orders and inventory control.  Distribution: Route optimizer, packing slips, driver reports.  Live, GPS tracking. Instant proof of delivery by email. CRM. Clean, easy interfaces. We set up your data and give you unlimited training by phone and email. Best customer service.

related_products.short_desc: Modern traceability/ERP software with lot track/trace, inventory control, recipes, costing, orders, POs, reports and integrations.
related_products.features: A modern and easy-to-use and implement wholesale bakery traceability/ERP system that enables your team to perform batch and lot track/trace, inventory control, recipe management, batch costing, B2B ordering portal and supplier purchasing, putting new ingredients and materials into service, and moving your data between systems such as Quickbooks, Sage Intacct, Shopify and over other 2,000 platforms. Wherefour runs on all internet-connected devices, including tablets and phones.

related_products.short_desc: Oracle Simphony POS fits every restaurant size & format: casual, quick service, independent, franchise, pubs, stadiums & more.
related_products.features: Oracle Simphony POS is built for ambitious restaurants. Our cloud-based POS connects every aspect of your operations so you can easily manage online orders, kitchen ops, inventory, menus, delivery, loyalty & more. Real-time analytics are included so you always have a pulse on sales, costs & staff performance. Simphony's open API & extensive cloud marketplace give you unlimited flexibility, agility & scale.

similar_products.short_desc: Modern traceability/ERP software with lot track/trace, inventory control, recipes, costing, orders, POs, reports and integrations.

similar_products.short_desc: A WHOLESALE cloud-based Bakery ERP solution for business in the food and beverage industry with a specialty in the baking industry.
similar_products.features: A WHOLESALE cloud-based order-entry management application designed with the bakery industry in mind. POMeSYS-Host (MyOnlineBakery.com) has four main components: Wholesale Order Entry, Accounts Receivable, Inventory Costing and Control, and Vendor Purchase Orders. Additional modules allow you to further customize!

similar_products.short_desc: KORONA designed POS software specifically for bakeries. The powerful solution was built to help businesses succeed and grow.

The software boasts fast transactions, ease of pricing and promotions, full customization, and powerful inventory management. The solution also comes with a built-in loyalty program, tip options, and individualized cashier reports. It can work for single shops, multi-location operations, and franchises. KORONA's bakery point of sale software caters to each individual shop, not the other way around.

similar_products.short_desc: Epos Now is driven by one simple motivation: to help businesses of all sizes reach their full potential through the power of the cloud.
similar_products.features: Epos Now helps more than 40,000 businesses across three continents leverage the power of cloud technology to streamline their operations and maximize profitability.

similar_products.short_desc: An all-in-one employee app that's both powerful, affordable and easy to use, especially for the mobile workforce. Start for free!
similar_products.features: Connecteam is a workforce management app that allows managers to put their business processes on autopilot and focus on business growth while also freeing up employees to be more productive, flexible, and happy. Save time and increase productivity with mobile-first custom checklists, forms, and reports; Schedule shifts and track work hours with GPS time clock; Simplify employee communication, enhance professional skills, manage daily tasks and so much more, all in one app.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Food Service Distribution software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Food Service Distribution tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Food Service Distribution software automates resource planning, distribution and order fulfillment activities for food distributors and wholesalers. These applications decrease operating costs and increase efficiency by integrating, automating and tracking the performance of a broad range food industry-specific and general business processes, including: order entry, invoicing, inventory management, accounts payable and receivable and sales analysis. Food Service Distribution software is related to Catering software, Food Service Management software and Restaurant Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Food Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Food Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Food Service Management software enables inventory control, purchasing, receiving and recipe management for both public and private food service operations. Organizations use these applications to manage their back office functions as well as their customer relationship and accounting needs. Food Service Management software helps to control costs, monitor inventory, and automate labor intensive tasks. Food Service Management software is related to Catering software, Food Service Distribution software and Restaurant Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nutrition Analysis software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nutrition Analysis tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nutrition Analysis software can be used in food service and food manufacturing industries to calculate nutritional values for menu items and recipes, generate nutrition and ingredient labels, and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant Management software integrates and automates accounting, scheduling and inventory control for restaurants. Restaurant Management applications typically offer a broad range of features that encompass traditional business necessities such as accounting, customer contact information, supplier data and payroll as well as restaurant-specific requirements such as table reservation management, guest management and menu costing. These applications also integrate with point of sale solutions and onsite or online credit card processing systems. Restaurant Management software is related to Food Service Distribution software and Food Service Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant POS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant POS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant POS software offers point of sale solutions specifically for the restaurant and bar industries. This type of software provides ordering, billing, reporting, accounting, table tracking, and receipt printing capabilities for restaurants and bars. Hardware such as computers, monitors and printers is often included in the purchase of POS systems. Restaurant POS software is related to POS software and Restaurant Management software.
